title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Alibates Quarries Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Alibates Quarries Tours              Alibates Quarries Tours       2016 Tour Schedule (April 16 - June 26, July 9 - August 26, September 10 - November 12, 2016) EVERY DAY, 10:00 a.m. & 2:00 p.m. Alibates Quarries Trail "Got Flint?" - Join a ranger for one of the more popular programs since 1965 when the monument was established. Tour the Alibates Quarry pits at the first National Monument in Texas. Learn about the Native Americans who lived here and used this stone for 13,000 years. Moderate hike, 1 mile round trip (many steps, 170 feet of elevation gain), 2 hours. Reservations only. Please call (806) 857-3151 to make your reservation. Groups accepted. Meet at the Alibates Visitor Center.    Â     Looking down the Alibates Quarries Trail into the Canadian River Valley. NPS Photo
